definition: The study and understanding of sound, including its production, transmission, and reception, as well as the properties and characteristics of sound waves. It is commonly applied in various fields such as music, architecture, engineering, and physics to analyze and manipulate sound.

examples.german: Die Akustik des Konzertsaals ist hervorragend.
examples.english: The acoustics of the concert hall are excellent.

examples.german: Die Akustik in diesem Raum ist sehr schlecht.
examples.english: The acoustics in this room are very poor.

examples.german: Er ist ein Experte f√ºr Raumakustik.
examples.english: He is an expert in room acoustics.

examples.german: Die Akustikgitarre hat einen warmen Klang.
examples.english: The acoustic guitar has a warm sound.

examples.german: Die Akustik des Theaters ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The acoustics of the theater are impressive.
